name: Shakir
text: Ta Sin! These are the verses of the Quran and the Book that makes (things) clear

name: Shakir
text: A guidance and good news for the believers,

name: Shakir
text: Who keep up prayer and pay the poor-rate, and of the hereafter, they are sure.

name: Shakir
text: As to those who do not believe in the hereafter, We have surely made their deeds fair-seeming to them, but they blindly wander on.

name: Shakir
text: These are they who shall have an evil punishment, and in the hereafter they shall be the greatest losers.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely you are made to receive the Quran from the Wise, the Knowing Allah.

name: Shakir
text: When Musa said to his family: Surely I see fire; I will bring to you from it some news, or I will bring to you therefrom a burning firebrand so that you may warm yourselves.

name: Shakir
text: So when he came to it a voice was uttered saying: Blessed is Whoever is in the fire and whatever is about it; and glory be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds;

name: Shakir
text: O Musa! surely I am Allah, the Mighty, the Wise;

name: Shakir
text: And cast down your staff. So when he saw it in motion as if it were a serpent, he turned back retreating and did not return: O Musa! fear not; surely the apostles shall not fear in My presence;

name: Shakir
text: Neither he who has been unjust, then he does good instead after evil, for surely I am the Forgiving, the Merciful:

name: Shakir
text: And enter your hand into the opening of your bosom, it shall come forth white without evil; among nine signs to Firon and his people, surely they are a transgressing people.

name: Shakir
text: So when Our clear signs came to them, they said: This is clear enchantment.

name: Shakir
text: And they denied them unjustly and proudly while their soul had been convinced of them; consider, then how was the end of the mischief-makers.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We gave knowledge to Dawood and Sulaiman, and they both said: Praise be to Allah, Who has made us to excel many of His believing servants.

name: Shakir
text: And Sulaiman was Dawood's heir, and he said: O men! we have been taught the language of birds, and we have been given all things; most surely this is manifest grace.

name: Shakir
text: And his hosts of the jinn and the men and the birds were gathered to him, and they were formed into groups.

name: Shakir
text: Until when they came to the valley of the Naml, a Namlite said: O Naml! enter your houses, (that) Sulaiman and his hosts may not crush you while they do not know.

name: Shakir
text: So he smiled, wondering at her word, and said: My Lord! grant me that I should be grateful for Thy favor which Thou hast bestowed on me and on my parents, and that I should do good such as Thou art pleased with, and make me enter, by Thy mercy, into Thy servants, the good ones.

name: Shakir
text: And he reviewed the birds, then said: How is it I see not the hoopoe or is it that he is of the absentees?

name: Shakir
text: I will most certainly punish him with a severe punishment, or kill him, or he shall bring to me a clear plea.

name: Shakir
text: And he tarried not long, then said: I comprehend that which you do not comprehend and I have brought to you a sure information from Sheba.

name: Shakir
text: Surely I found a woman ruling over them, and she has been given abundance and she has a mighty throne:

name: Shakir
text: I found her and her people adoring the sun instead of Allah, and the Shaitan has made their deeds fair-seeming to them and thus turned them from the way, so they do not go aright

name: Shakir
text: That they do not make obeisance to Allah, Who brings forth what is hidden in the heavens and the earth and knows what you hide and what you make manifest:

name: Shakir
text: Allah, there is no god but He: He is the Lord of mighty power.

name: Shakir
text: He said: We will see whether you have told the truth or whether you are of the liars:

name: Shakir
text: Take this my letter and hand it over to them, then turn away from them and see what (answer) they return.

name: Shakir
text: She said: O chief! surely an honorable letter has been delivered to me

name: Shakir
text: Surely it is from Sulaiman, and surely it is in the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful;

name: Shakir
text: Saying: exalt not yourselves against me and come to me in submission.

name: Shakir
text: She said: O chiefs! give me advice respecting my affair: I never decide an affair until you are in my presence.

name: Shakir
text: They said: We are possessors of strength and possessors of mighty prowess, and the command is yours, therefore see what you will command.

name: Shakir
text: She said: Surely the kings, when they enter a town, ruin it and make the noblest of its people to be low, and thus they (always) do;

name: Shakir
text: And surely I am going to send a present to them, and shall wait to see what (answer) do the apostles bring back.

name: Shakir
text: So when he came to Sulaiman, he said: What! will you help me with wealth? But what Allah has given me is better than what He has given you. Nay, you are exultant because of your present;

name: Shakir
text: Go back to them, so we will most certainly come to them with hosts which they shall have no power to oppose, and we will most certainly expel them therefrom in abasement, and they shall be in a state of ignominy.

name: Shakir
text: He said: O chiefs! which of you can bring to me her throne before they come to me in submission?

name: Shakir
text: One audacious among the jinn said: I will bring it to you before you rise up from your place; and most surely I am strong (and) trusty for it.

name: Shakir
text: One who had the knowledge of the Book said: I will bring it to you in the twinkling of an eye. Then when he saw it settled beside him, he said: This is of the grace of my Lord that He may try me whether I am grateful or ungrateful; and whoever is grateful, he is grateful only for his own soul, and whoever is ungrateful, then surely my Lord is Self-sufficient, Honored.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Alter her throne for her, we will see whether she follows the right way or is of those who do not go aright.

name: Shakir
text: So when she came, it was said: Is your throne like this? She said: It is as it were the same, and we were given the knowledge before it, and we were submissive.

name: Shakir
text: And what she worshipped besides Allah prevented her, surely she was of an unbelieving people.

name: Shakir
text: It was said to her: Enter the palace; but when she saw it she deemed it to be a great expanse of water, and bared her legs. He said: Surely it is a palace made smooth with glass. She said: My Lord! surely I have been unjust to myself, and I submit with Sulaiman to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We sent to Samood their brother Salih, saying: Serve Allah; and lo! they became two sects quarrelling with each other.

name: Shakir
text: He said: O my people! why do you seek to hasten on the evil before the good? Why do you not ask forgiveness of Allah so that you may be dealt with mercifully?

name: Shakir
text: They said: We have met with ill luck on account of you and on account of those with you. He said: The cause of your evil fortune is with Allah; nay, you are a people who are tried.

name: Shakir
text: And there were in the city nine persons who made mischief in the land and did not act aright.

name: Shakir
text: They said: Swear to each other by Allah that we will certainly make a sudden attack on him and his family by night, then we will say to his heir: We did not witness the destruction of his family, and we are most surely truthful.

name: Shakir
text: And they planned a plan, and We planned a plan while they perceived not.

name: Shakir
text: See, then, how was the end of their plan that We destroyed them and their people, all (of them).

name: Shakir
text: So those are their houses fallen down because they were unjust, most surely there is a sign in this for a people who know.

name: Shakir
text: And We delivered those who believed and who guarded (against evil).

name: Shakir
text: And (We sent) Lut, when he said to his people: What! do you commit indecency while you see?

name: Shakir
text: What! do you indeed approach men lustfully rather than women? Nay, you are a people who act ignorantly.

name: Shakir
text: But the answer of his people was no other except that they ~s said: Turn out Lut's followers from your town; surely they are a people who would keep pure!

name: Shakir
text: But We delivered him and his followers except his wife; We ordained her to be of those who remained behind.

name: Shakir
text: And We rained on them a rain, and evil was the rain of those who had been warned.

name: Shakir
text: Say: Praise be to Allah and peace on His servants whom He has chosen: is Allah better, or what they associate (with Him)?

name: Shakir
text: Nay, He Who created the heavens and the earth, and sent down for you water from the cloud; then We cause to grow thereby beautiful gardens; it is not possible for you that you should make the trees thereof to grow. Is there a god with Allah? Nay! they are people who deviate.

name: Shakir
text: Or, Who made the earth a restingplace, and made in it rivers, and raised on it mountains and placed between the two seas a barrier. Is there a god with Allah? Nay! most of them do not know!

name: Shakir
text: Or, Who answers the distressed one when he calls upon Him and removes the evil, and He will make you successors in the earth. Is there a god with Allah? Little is it that you mind!

name: Shakir
text: Or, Who guides you in utter darkness of the land and the sea, and Who sends the winds as good news before His mercy. Is there a god with Allah? Exalted by Allah above what they associate (with Him).

name: Shakir
text: Or, Who originates the creation, then reproduces it and Who gives you sustenance from the heaven and the earth. Is there a god With Allah? Say: Bring your proof if you are truthful.

name: Shakir
text: Say: No one in the heavens and the earth knows the unseen but Allah; and they do not know when they shall be raised.

name: Shakir
text: Nay, their knowledge respecting the hereafter is slight and hasty; nay, they are in doubt about it; nay, they are quite blind to it

name: Shakir
text: And those who disbelieve say: What! when we have become dust and our fathers (too), shall we certainly be brought forth?

name: Shakir
text: We have certainly been promised this, we and our fathers before; these are naught but stories of the ancients

name: Shakir
text: Say: Travel in the earth, then see how was the end of the guilty.

name: Shakir
text: And grieve not for them and be not distressed because of what they plan.

name: Shakir
text: And they say: When will this threat come to pass, if you are truthful?

name: Shakir
text: Say: Maybe there may have drawn near to you somewhat of that which you seek to hasten on.

name: Shakir
text: And surely your Lord is the Lord of grace to men, but most of them are not grateful.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they manifest.

name: Shakir
text: And there is nothing concealed in the heaven and the earth but it is in a clear book.

name: Shakir
text: Surely this Quran declares to the children of Israel most of what they differ in.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely it is a guidance and a mercy for the believers.

name: Shakir
text: Surely your Lord will judge between them by his judgment, and He is the Mighty, the knowing.

name: Shakir
text: Therefore rely on Allah; surely you are on the clear truth.

name: Shakir
text: Surely you do not make the dead to hear, and you do not make the deaf to hear the call when they go back retreating.

name: Shakir
text: Nor can you be a guide to the blind out of their error; you cannot make to bear (any one) except those who believe in Our communications, so they submit.

name: Shakir
text: And when the word shall come to pass against them, We shall bring forth for them a creature from the earth that shall wound them, because people did not believe in Our communications.

name: Shakir
text: And on the day when We will gather from every nation a party from among those who rejected Our communications, then they shall be formed into groups.

name: Shakir
text: Until when they come, He will say: Did you reject My communications while you had no comprehensive knowledge of them? Or what was it that you did?

name: Shakir
text: And the word shall come to pass against them because they were unjust, so they shall not speak.

name: Shakir
text: Do they not consider that We have made the night that. they may rest therein, and the day to give light? Most surely there are signs in this for a people who believe.

name: Shakir
text: And on the day when the trumpet shall be blown, then those who are in the heavens and those who are in the earth shall be terrified except such as Allah please, and all shall come to him abased.

name: Shakir
text: And you see the mountains, you think them to be solid, and they shall pass away as the passing away of the cloud-- the handiwork of Allah Who has made every thing thoroughly; surely He is Aware of what you do.

name: Shakir
text: Whoever brings good, he shall have better than it; and they shall be secure from terror on the day.

name: Shakir
text: And whoever brings evil, these shall be thrown down on their faces into the fire; shall you be rewarded (for) aught except what you did?

name: Shakir
text: I am commanded only that I should serve the Lord of this city, Who has made it sacred, and His are all things; and I am commanded that I should be of these who submit;

name: Shakir
text: And that I should recite the Quran. Therefore whoever goes aright, he goes aright for his own soul, and whoever goes ' astray, then say: I am only one of the warners.

name: Shakir
text: And say: Praise be to Allah, He will show you His signs so that you shall recognize them; nor is your Lord heedless of what you do.
